OrgName.entry: ECCLESALL LIBRARY READING GROUPS FOR ADULTS

Desc.entry: Various reading groups based at Ecclesall Library.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: 1st Mon in the month 6-7pm (Evening Reading Group, currently full, waiting list in operation), last Mon in the month 6.30-8pm (Crime Readers Group), 1st Fri in the month 10.30am-12noon (Short Story Reading Group), last Fri in the month 1.30-3pm (Friday Afternoon Reading Group, currently full, waiting list in operation), 2nd Sat in the month 11am-12noon (Saturday Book Group, currently full, waiting list in operation)
